# External Dependencies

This directory contains external code cloned from GitHub.

## Fenify-3D

**Purpose:** FEN detection from chess board images with various viewing angles

**Clone:**
```bash
cd external/
git clone https://github.com/notnil/fenify-3D.git
```

**Model Download:**
Download the pre-trained model from the Fenify-3D releases page and place it in `models/fenify_model.pt`

Alternatively, check the Fenify-3D README for training your own model.
